prompt.content: Identify and summarize the two primary qualitative factors that explain the largest year-over-year change in the T&D expense line item across FY 2023–2024 for Netflix, Inc. (NFLX)

rubrics.name: Recognizes that T&D expenses also include costs associated with general-use computer hardware and software.

messages.content: Recognizes that T&D expenses also include costs associated with general-use computer hardware and software.

rubrics.name: Identifies the primary qualitative factor as a rise in personnel-related costs.

messages.content: Identifies the primary qualitative factor as a rise in personnel-related costs.

rubrics.name: Notes that, per the same Q2 2024 10-Q, T&D expenses increased by about 5% year-over-year for the first half.

messages.content: Notes that, per the same Q2 2024 10-Q, T&D expenses increased by about 5% year-over-year for the first half.

rubrics.name: Notes that, per the Q2 2024 10-Q, T&D expenses increased by about 8% year-over-year for the quarter.

messages.content: Notes that, per the Q2 2024 10-Q, T&D expenses increased by about 8% year-over-year for the quarter.

rubrics.name: States that, per the Q2 2024 10-Q, the six-month T&D increase was primarily driven by higher personnel-related costs.

messages.content: States that, per the Q2 2024 10-Q, the six-month T&D increase was primarily driven by higher personnel-related costs.

rubrics.name: Quantifies that the Q2 2024 10-Q cites an approximate $52 million increase in personnel-related costs for the six-month period.

messages.content: Quantifies that the Q2 2024 10-Q cites an approximate $52 million increase in personnel-related costs for the six-month period.

rubrics.name: States that, per the Q2 2024 10-Q, the Q2 2024 T&D increase was primarily driven by higher personnel-related costs.

messages.content: States that, per the Q2 2024 10-Q, the Q2 2024 T&D increase was primarily driven by higher personnel-related costs.

rubrics.name: Quantifies that the Q2 2024 10-Q cites an approximate $43 million increase in personnel-related costs for the quarter.

messages.content: Quantifies that the Q2 2024 10-Q cites an approximate $43 million increase in personnel-related costs for the quarter.

rubrics.name: States that, per the Q3 2024 10-Q, technology and development expenses for the nine months ended September 30, 2024 increased by about 7% year-over-year.

messages.content: States that, per the Q3 2024 10-Q, technology and development expenses for the nine months ended September 30, 2024 increased by about 7% year-over-year.

rubrics.name: States that, per the Q3 2024 10-Q, the nine-month T&D increase was primarily driven by higher personnel-related costs.

messages.content: States that, per the Q3 2024 10-Q, the nine-month T&D increase was primarily driven by higher personnel-related costs.

rubrics.name: Quantifies that the Q3 2024 10-Q cites an approximate $122 million increase in personnel-related costs for the nine-month period.

messages.content: Quantifies that the Q3 2024 10-Q cites an approximate $122 million increase in personnel-related costs for the nine-month period.

rubrics.name: States that Q3 2024 standalone technology and development expenses increased by about 12% year-over-year.

messages.content: States that Q3 2024 standalone technology and development expenses increased by about 12% year-over-year.

rubrics.name: States that, per the Q3 2024 10-Q, the Q3 2024 T&D increase was primarily driven by higher personnel-related costs.

messages.content: States that, per the Q3 2024 10-Q, the Q3 2024 T&D increase was primarily driven by higher personnel-related costs.

rubrics.name: Quantifies that the Q3 2024 10-Q cites an approximate $70 million increase in personnel-related costs for the quarter.

messages.content: Quantifies that the Q3 2024 10-Q cites an approximate $70 million increase in personnel-related costs for the quarter.

rubrics.name: Identifies the second qualitative factor as increased spending on general-use computer hardware/software within T&D.

messages.content: Identifies the second qualitative factor as increased spending on general-use computer hardware/software within T&D.

rubrics.name: Approximately 90% of the $249.5M FY‑2024 vs FY‑2023 increase in T&D is attributable to personnel-related costs.

messages.content: Approximately 90% of the $249.5M FY‑2024 vs FY‑2023 increase in T&D is attributable to personnel-related costs.
